Steve Ballmer also believes that the introduction of the Kinect motion controller is beginning to expand the console's appeal beyond that of the male hardcore bedroom gamer-geek. He said: I think about my own family. My wife used to say,` No, no, that's the machine the boys use,' and now she says,` Yeah, I want to go watch movies. Let's go play the dance game' .`` It opens up accessibility to family entertainment because with the Kinect, you control these systems with your body, with your voice.
